response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds significant worth to me, reflecting its exceptional quality and rarity. Considering its intrinsic value and the effort put into it, I am extending an exclusive offer for you to purchase this product at a special price of $750,000. I believe this offer presents an excellent chance for both of us to benefit from this transaction. Should you be interested in exploring further, please let me know, and we can discuss the details. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 750000}
